description: Our warmest Beta hardshell brings a versatility that lets you to embrace the range of winter’s opportunities. Climbing, warming up in the hut after the day’s tour, hiking in cold, wet weather – trust the proven waterproof, windproof, breathable protection of GORE-TEX to shut out the elements and premium 850 fill goose down to keep you warm. The helmet-compatible StormHood™ extends coverage, pit zippers ventilate, and the two-way front zip provides freedom of movement and is harness compatible.
name: Arcteryx Beta Down Insulated Jacket - Mens
